attributes.comment:
I am asking that the government reconsider raising the fees for the immigration
process. This increase will affect not only new residents coming to America
possibly forcing them to remain illegal aliens but will adversly affect the children
who are being adopted internationally.

Adoption is expensive anyway. The UCIS is the first large amount of money that
a family faces. This could be the one thing that would prevent a child from having
a family in a country with the freedoms of the US.

I deeply feel that the increase is not necessary and other means should be found
to make up the financial difference. I am just one small voice but I know there are
many families in a precarious situation that may reach the end with increased
fees.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Beverly Moore
